item.description:
LIMITED SPACE - REGISTER EARLY - LIMIT 2 PER FIRM

Tom Vollaro, Autodesk Senior Interaction Designer
Greg (Frame) Demchak, Autodesk Senior Interaction Designer
Lira Nikolovska, Autodesk Senior Interaction Designer
Chauncey Wilson, Autodesk Senior Manager, User Research

Networking 6 to 6:30 PM
Presentation: 6:30 â€“ 7:30 PM
Questions: 7:30 to 8 PM

Members of the AEC User Experience Team will describe the user research and design activities that went into the design of the Autodesk Revit 2010 products. Members of the User Experience team will describe the design process that we used and then demonstrate the new product. Attendees will have a chance to ask questions about our process and product.
item.name: The Path from Autodesk Revit 2009 to Revit 2010: A Case Study and Demonstration
